ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate (was:RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate  weapon?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Why do I see this as the new m.o.... Since you can die hard on the planes, the Uber-Guilders begin hard and serious camping to out their main chars with some
ygData.messageBody:
Why do I see this as the new m.o....

Since you can "die hard" on the planes, the Uber-Guilders begin hard and
serious camping to out their main chars with some "decent" stuffs before
they make their Plane trips. "Hey get outta my way I need that for my next
Plane trip!"

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 1:36 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Plane of Hate (was:RE: [eqbards] Rumor of
the bards ultimate weapon?)

From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

I would not count on the Plane of Hate being a cure-all for
high-level zone
overcrowding. As Brad said recently to a group on the Fear
Plane that the
Plane of Hate will make the Plane of Fear look like a newbie
zone.

Rokenn
